title: Financial Modelling For Series A Fundraising
description: I’ll design a framework that not only covers housing and services but also integrates renewable energy, local commerce, and reinvestment cycles to keep the economy self-sustaining. My goal is to give you a clear, data-driven roadmap that convinces stakeholders, attracts investors, and ensures the community thrives long after launch.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Research & Benchmarking
milestones.description: Analyze comparable smart community projects worldwide, assess Lagos’ local economic conditions, and map out regulatory, infrastructural, and demographic realities that shape feasibility.
